HELSINKI China will launch its Change-6 lunar sample return mission next year in an attempt at a first-ever collection of material from the far side of the moon.

articles.title: Earth from Space: Southern Patagonian Ice Field - European Space Agency
articles.description: Part of the Southern Patagonian Ice Field with its white glaciers and aquamarine lakes is featured in this Copernicus Sentinel-2 image from 10 January 2023.

articles.author: Science X
articles.title: Explosion in fish biodiversity due to genetic recycling, study shows - Phys.org
articles.description: Scientists show that the extraordinary diversity of cichlid fish in Africa's Lake Victoria was made possible by "genetic recycling"—repeated cycles of new species appearing and rapidly adapting to different roles in the ecosystem. An evolutionary case study t…
